task.name: rdeStaging
task.description: This job generates a full RDE escrow deposit as a single gigantic XML document and streams it to cloud storage. When this job has finished successfully, it'll launch a separate task that uploads the deposit file to Iron Mountain via SFTP.

task.name: rdeUpload
task.description: This job is a no-op unless RdeUploadCursor falls behind for some reason.

task.name: tmchDnl
task.description: This job downloads the latest DNL from MarksDB and inserts it into the database. (See: TmchDnlAction, ClaimsList)

task.name: tmchSmdrl
task.description: This job downloads the latest SMDRL from MarksDB and inserts it into the database. (See: TmchSmdrlAction, SignedMarkRevocationList)

task.name: tmchCrl
task.description: This job downloads the latest CRL from MarksDB and inserts it into the database. (See: TmchCrlAction)

task.name: syncGroupMembers
task.description: Syncs RegistrarContact changes in the past hour to Google Groups.

task.name: syncRegistrarsSheet
task.description: Synchronize Registrar entities to Google Spreadsheets.

task.name: exportDomainLists
task.description: This job exports lists of all active domain names to Google Drive and Google Cloud Storage.

task.name: expandBillingRecurrences
task.description: This job runs an action that creates synthetic one-time billing events from billing recurrences. Events are created for all recurrences that should exist between the RECURRING_BILLING cursor's time and the execution time of the action.

task.name: resaveAllEppResourcesPipeline
task.description: This job resaves all our resources, projected in time to "now".

task.name: deleteExpiredDomains
task.description: This job runs an action that deletes domains that are past their autorenew end date.

task.name: deleteProberData
task.description: This job clears out data from probers and runs once a week.

task.name: exportReservedTerms
task.description: Reserved terms export to Google Drive job for creating once-daily exports.

task.name: exportPremiumTerms
task.description: Exports premium price lists to the Google Drive folders for each TLD once per day.

task.name: readDnsRefreshRequests
task.description: Enqueue a ReadDnsRefreshRequestAction for each TLD.

task.name: wipeOutContactHistoryPii
task.description: This job runs weekly to wipe out PII fields of ContactHistory entities that have been in the database for a certain period of time.

task.name: bsaDownload
task.description: Downloads the BSA block lists and processes the changes.
